mapper.insert: insert into review(attraction_info_id, member_id, title, content, image_url) values (#{attractionInfoId}, #{memberId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imageUrl})
mapper.select: select r.review_id, r.attraction_info_id, a.name as attractionName, m.nickname, r.title, r.content, r.image_url as reviewImageUrl, m.image_url as profileImageUrl, r.hits, r.create_date, count(l.member_board_like_id) as likes, if(r.member_id = #{memberId}, true, false) as isWriteByMe, if(r.review_id in (select review_id from member_board_like where member_board_like.member_id = #{memberId}), true, false) as isCheckLike from review r join member m on r.member_id = m.member_id join attraction_info a on r.attraction_info_id = a.attraction_info_id left join member_board_like l on r.review_id = l.review_id group by r.review_id having r.review_id = #{reviewId}
